pages.text: 79|16|tvuva enna parisud'dha tal‌varayil vecc addehattinre raksitav addehatte vilicc iprakaram paranna sandarbham
79|17|ni phir'aunre atuttekku peakuka. tirccayayum avan atirukavinnirikkunnu
79|18|ennitt ceadikkuka: ni parisud'dhi prapikkan tayyaruntea
79|19|ninre raksitavinkalekk ninakk nan vali kaniccutaram. ennitt ni bhayappetanum (tayyaruntea)
79|20|annane addeham (musa) avann a mahattaya drstantam kaniccukeatuttu
79|21|appeal avan nisedhiccu tallukayum dhikkarikkukayum ceytu
79|22|pinne, avan etir sramannal natattuvanayi pintirinnu peayi
79|23|annane avan (tanre alkkare) sekhariccu. ennittu vilambaram ceytu
79|24|nan ninnalute atyunnatanaya raksitavakunnu enn avan parannu
79|25|appeal paraleakattileyum ihaleakattileyum siksaykkayi allahu avane pitikuti
79|26|tirccayayum atil bhayappetunnavarkk oru gunapathamunt‌
79|27|ninnalanea srstikkappetan kututal prayasamullavar. atalla; akasamanea? atine avan nirmiccirikkunnu
79|28|atinre vitanam avan uyarttukayum, atine avan vyavasthappetuttukayum ceytirikkunnu
79|29|atile ratriye avan iruttakkukayum, atile pakaline avan pratyaksappetuttukayum ceytirikkunnu
79|30|atinu sesam bhumiye avan vikasippiccirikkunnu
79|31|atil ninn atile vellavum sasyajalannalum avan purattu keantuvarikayum ceytirikkunnu
79|32|parvvatannale avan urappiccu nirttukayum ceytirikkunnu
79|33|ninnalkkum ninnalute kannukalikalkkum upayeagattinayitt‌
79|34|ennal a maha vipatt varunna sandarbham
79|35|atayatu manusyan tan ad'dhvaniccu veccatinepparri ormikkunna divasam
79|36|kanunnavarkk venti narakam velivakkappetunna divasam
79|37|(ann‌) ar atirukaviyukayum
79|38|ihaleakajivitattinu kututal pradhan'yam nalkukayum ceytuvea
79|39|(avann‌) kattijvalikkunna narakam tanneyan sanketam
79|40|appeal etearal tanre raksitavinre sthanatte bhayappetukayum manas'sine tannistattil ninn vilakkinirttukayum ceytuvea
79|41|(avann‌) svargam tanneyan sanketam
79|42|a antyasamayattepparri, ateppealan sambhavikkuka enn avar ninneat ceadikkunnu
79|43|ninakk atinepparri ent parayananullat‌
79|44|ninre raksitavinkalekkan atinre kalasam
79|45|atine bhayappetunnavarkk oru takkitukaran matraman ni
79|46|atine avar kanunna divasam oru vaikunneramea oru prabhatattilea allate avar (ivite) kaliccukuttiyittillatta pealeyayirikkum (avarkk teannuka)
